description:
After successfully managing to escape from the frogs, Midge and the others continue to try to make it to the top deck where a supply ship remains, but they continue to be confronted by challenges. With a few more narrow escapes, they finally reach the dock to find the last remaining supply ship, but just as escape is in their reach Marbo is hesitant to leave. Will the trio be able to make it off the station together?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hirake! Kibou no Tobira / Saraba Uchuu Station
Open Up! Door of Hope / Farewell, Space Station
開け! 希望のトビラ / さらば宇宙ステーション
